group_1.textLeft: …Somewhere around here, right?

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, I think this is the place…

group_1.textLeft: …Um, maybe we shouldn’t do this after all…

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?! But we came all this way…

group_1.textLeft: I’ve never…been to a café like this before…
I’m kind of nervous…

group_1.textRight: I-I am, too…

group_1.textLeft: …And I don’t know how I’m supposed@to show my face to her again…

group_1.textRight: …Neither do I.
How unusual to see you here.

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi…
U-uh…

group_1.textRight: Mm? What is it?

group_1.textLeft: We wanted to talk to you for a bit…

group_1.textRight: …[wait:0.8][chara:101601:lipSynch_1][chara:101601:cheek_0][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]I see.
Can you keep it brief?

group_1.textLeft: Well…um, not really, I don’t think.

group_1.textRight: Then… Come with me, both of you.

group_1.textCenter: Welcome home, Masters. It is wonderful@to have you back.
Please feel free to take any seat you’d like.

group_1.textRight: Ah, is this your first time at a maid café?
Here, we treat our customers as our masters.

group_1.textLeft: W-well… It’s a little different from what@I’m used to…
You’re not going to get mad at us…?

group_1.textRight: My reputation isn’t that bad, is it?
…So, what did you want to tell me?

group_1.textLeft: …There’s this rumor going around…

group_1.textRight: …I see, so the Magical Girls of the East@and Promised Blood are…

group_1.textLeft: I know it’s not our place to say, since we were@with the Magius, but we didn’t want this...
...to turn into another fight between@the East and West. So we were wondering…
Do you know of any girls who might be@getting involved with them in secret…?

group_1.textRight: Well, it’s not an impossibility. However…
As far as I’m aware, no such issues exist.

group_1.textLeft: …Really?

group_1.textRight: These days, there would be little reason…
...for any of the Eastern Magical Girls to go@through the trouble of betraying the Union.
And you know what?
Tricking these eyes of mine is no simple feat.

group_1.textLeft: I’m sure it’s not, but…

group_1.textRight: …Hmm.
Oh dear… Before you know it, more@masters have come to join us.
…Do you two have any free time@tomorrow or the day after?

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah, but…

group_1.textRight: Then we can talk again. I will let you@know where to meet up.

group_1.textLeft: U-uh…what are you…?

group_1.textRight: Here, let me give you this. Take your time@and enjoy yourselves.
I’ll see you later.

group_1.textLeft: She’s gone…
Hagumun, what did she give you…?

group_1.textRight: A coupon for the café…
